com.punchthrough.bean.sdk

Class Bean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchthrough.bean.sdk.Bean

  • public class Bean
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a physical Bean.

    • Field Summary

      Used by Android android.os.Parcel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bean(BluetoothDevice device)
      Create a Bean using its android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice The Bean will not be connected until #connect(android.content.Context, BeanListener) is called.
      Bean(BluetoothDevice device, GattClient client, Handler handler)
      Alternate Bean constructor practicing dependency injection, currently used by tests only

        public void setScratchData(ScratchBank bank,
                           byte[] data)

        bank - The ScratchBank being set
        data - The bytes to write into the scratch bank

      • setScratchData

        public void setScratchData(ScratchBank bank,
                           java.lang.String data)
        Set a scratch bank data value with a string in the form of UTF-8 bytes.
        Parameters:
        bank - The ScratchBank being set
        data - The string data to write into the scratch bank as UTF-8

      • setRadioConfig

        public void setRadioConfig(RadioConfig config)

        Set the radio config.

        This is equivalent to calling setRadioConfig(com.punchthrough.bean.sdk.message.RadioConfig, boolean) with true for the save parameter.

        Parameters:
        config - the RadioConfig to set

      • setRadioConfig

        public void setRadioConfig(RadioConfig config,
                           boolean save)
        Set the radio config.
        Parameters:
        config - the RadioConfig to set
        save - true to save the config in non-volatile storage, false otherwise.

      • sendSerialMessage

        public void sendSerialMessage(byte[] value)
        Send raw bytes to the Bean as a serial message.
        Parameters:
        value - the message payload

      • setPin

        public void setPin(int pin,
                   boolean active)
        Set the Bean's security code.
        Parameters:
        pin - the 6 digit pin as a number, e.g. 123456
        active - true to enable authenticated mode, false to disable the current pin

      • sendSerialMessage

        public void sendSerialMessage(java.lang.String value)
        Send a UTF-8 string to the Bean as a serial message.
        Parameters:
        value - the message to send as UTF-8 bytes

        Enable or disable the Arduino.
        Parameters:

      • readArduinoPowerState

        public void readArduinoPowerState(Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
        Read the Arduino power state.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback for the power state result: true if the Arduino is on

      • readBatteryLevel

        public void readBatteryLevel(Callback<BatteryLevel> callback)
        Read the battery level.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback for the BatteryLevel result

      • endSerialGate

        public void endSerialGate()
        End the Arduino's serial gate, allowing serial data from the Arduino to be read by the connected Android client. The serial gate exists to prevent chatty sketches from interfering with the behavior of clients that want to send commands to the ATmega. It is enabled on initial connection to the Bean.

      • programWithSketch

        public void programWithSketch(SketchHex hex,
                              Callback<UploadProgress> onProgress,
                              java.lang.Runnable onComplete)
        Programs the Bean with an Arduino sketch in hex form. The Bean's sketch name and programmed-at timestamp will be set from the SketchHex object.
        Parameters:
        hex - The sketch to be sent to the Bean
        onProgress - Called with progress while the sketch upload is occurring
        onComplete - Called when the sketch upload is complete

      • programWithFirmware

        public OADProfile.OADApproval programWithFirmware(FirmwareBundle bundle,
                                                  OADProfile.OADListener listener)
        Programs the Bean with new firmware images.
        Parameters:
        bundle - The firmware package holding A and B images to be sent to the Bean
        listener - OADListener to alert the client of OAD state

        public boolean firmwareUpdateInProgress()

        Used by Android android.os.Parcel.
